body: @Kirby Cosmico exactly thats the point its fantastic, when your in another world you can fuck the kappa's as hard as you want without some retarded gimp yelling "hey whats he doing to that tortoise! someone call the police!"

If you wanna have far far far more powerful vivid lucid dreams buy some nicotine patches and stick like half or a quarter of one on yourself before you go to sleep the effectiveness is unbelievable, look into it if you doubt me. it works.
